Argentina: Development of metallurgical technologies, permitting elaborate bronzeworks
Bhutan: During the reign of Bhaskar Varman of Kamarupa, parts of Bhutan come under Indian control. (to 650)
Estonia: Vikings from Gotland sail to Hiiumaa (Dagö) island and build a fortification there.
King Ingvar of Sweden invades Estonia, but is killed. His son Anund avenges his father and raids the country.
